sentences.sContent: We crept carefully along the narrow ledge.
sentences.sCn: 我们小心翼翼地沿着狭窄的岩架爬行。

sentences.sContent: He leapt onto a ledge of rock.

synos.tran: [家具]壁架；突出之部份；暗礁；矿层

trans.tranCn: 壁架；突出之部份；暗礁；矿层
trans.tranOther: a narrow flat piece of rock that sticks out on the side of a mountain or cliff
